title: The Tentacle Staff
data:
| )   Tentacle Staff   *(No tile)*      |                                                                                                                                                    |
| ------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Base item                             | [quarterstaff](/wiki/Quarterstaff "Quarterstaff")                                                                                                  |
|                                       |                                                                                                                                                    |
| Damage vs. small                      | 1d6 **+5 + level drain**                                                                                                                           |
| Damage vs. large                      | 1d6 **+5 + level drain**                                                                                                                           |
| To-hit bonus                          | **+8**                                                                                                                                             |
| Bonus versus                          | not [drain resistant](/wiki/Drain_resistance "Drain resistance")                                                                                   |
|                                       |                                                                                                                                                    |
| Weapon skill                          | [quarterstaff](/wiki/Quarterstaff "Quarterstaff")                                                                                                  |
| Size                                  | [two-handed](/wiki/Two-handed "Two-handed")                                                                                                        |
| Affiliation                           | - [chaotic](/wiki/Chaotic "Chaotic")
- [Elf](/wiki/Elf "Elf")
- [intelligent](/wiki/Intelligent_artifact "Intelligent artifact")                   |
|                                       |                                                                                                                                                    |
| When carried                          | * [magic resistance](/wiki/Magic_resistance "Magic resistance")                                                                                    |
| When wielded                          | - faster [energy regeneration](/wiki/Energy_regeneration "Energy regeneration")
- [half spell damage](/wiki/Half_spell_damage "Half spell damage") |
| When [invoked](/wiki/Invoke "Invoke") | * [level teleport](/wiki/Level_teleport "Level teleport")                                                                                          |
|                                       |                                                                                                                                                    |
| Base price                            | [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid")                                                                                                                      |
| Weight                                | [40](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                                                                                                                        |
| Material                              | [wood](/wiki/Wood "Wood")                                                                                                                          |

**The Tentacle Staff** is the Drow (or [chaotic](/wiki/Chaotic "Chaotic") [Elf](/wiki/Elf_\(role\) "Elf (role)")) [quest artifact](/wiki/Quest_artifact "Quest artifact") in [SLASH 6](/wiki/SLASH_6 "SLASH 6"). It is the prize for completing the [Drow quest](/wiki/Drow_quest "Drow quest"), and is chaotic for wishing purposes. Its [base item](/wiki/Base_item "Base item") type is a [quarterstaff](/wiki/Quarterstaff "Quarterstaff"). The Tentacle Staff and mentions of it can still be found in the source code of [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM") and [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM");[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)[\[2\]](#cite_note-2) a comment in the latter's code indicates that it may be used as a future [crowning](/wiki/Crowning "Crowning") gift for [player drow](/wiki/Drow_\(starting_race\) "Drow (starting race)").[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Effects](#Effects)
- [2 Messages](#Messages)
- [3 dNetHack](#dNetHack)
- [4 References](#References)
- [5 See also](#See_also)

## Effects

The Tentacle Staff grants +8 to-hit, and deals +5 damage and [drain levels](/wiki/Drain_life "Drain life") from non-[resistant](/wiki/Drain_resistance "Drain resistance") targets. When carried, the Tentacle Staff grants [magic resistance](/wiki/Magic_resistance "Magic resistance"); when wielded, it additionally confers fast [energy regeneration](/wiki/Energy_regeneration "Energy regeneration") and [half spell damage](/wiki/Half_spell_damage "Half spell damage"). When invoked, it allows the player to [level teleport](/wiki/Level_teleport "Level teleport"), similar to [the Orb of Fate](/wiki/The_Orb_of_Fate "The Orb of Fate").

## Messages

- The writhing tentacles draw the life from \<target>!

  You hit a monster with The Tentacle Staff and drained a level from it.

## dNetHack

The variant [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack") contains a somewhat similar artifact [flail](/wiki/Flail "Flail") named [The Tentacle Rod](/wiki/The_Tentacle_Rod "The Tentacle Rod"), which is the [quest artifact](/wiki/Quest_artifact "Quest artifact") for [Drow](/wiki/Drow "Drow") Priests, Rangers, Rogues, and Wizards that turn renegade on their [racial quest](/wiki/Drow_Racial_quest "Drow Racial quest") (retooled from the original Drow quest). It lacks the Staff's drain life attack and other properties, but it can deal multiple attacks and inflict status ailments on targets; while wielded, it also decreases the chance of spell failure and absorbs curses.

## References

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [artifact.c in SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2, line 1382](/wiki/Source:SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/artifact.c#line1382 "Source:SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/artifact.c")
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [SlashTHEM 0.9.7 artilist.h, line 543](https://github.com/Soviet5lo/SlashTHEM/blob/v0.9.7/include/artilist.h#L543)
3. [↑](#cite_ref-3) [SlashTHEM 0.9.7 artilist.h, line 560](https://github.com/Soviet5lo/SlashTHEM/blob/v0.9.7/include/artilist.h#L560)

- SLASH 6 include/artilist.h#line 370
- SLASH 6 src/artifact.c#line 1059

## See also

- [Drow quest](/wiki/Drow_quest "Drow quest")

html:
The Tentacle Staff

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
)   Tentacle Staff   (No tile)
Base item quarterstaff
Damage vs. small 1d6 +5 + level drain
Damage vs. large 1d6 +5 + level drain
To-hit bonus +8
Bonus versus not drain resistant
Weapon skill quarterstaff
Size two-handed
Affiliation
  • chaotic
  • Elf
  • intelligent
When carried
  • magic resistance
When wielded
  • faster energy regeneration
  • half spell damage
When invoked
  • level teleport
Base price zm
Weight 40
Material wood

The Tentacle Staff is the Drow (or chaotic Elf) quest artifact in SLASH 6. It is the prize for completing the Drow quest, and is chaotic for wishing purposes. Its base item type is a quarterstaff. The Tentacle Staff and mentions of it can still be found in the source code of SLASH'EM and SlashTHEM;[1][2] a comment in the latter's code indicates that it may be used as a future crowning gift for player drow.[3]

Contents

  • 1 Effects
  • 2 Messages
  • 3 dNetHack
  • 4 References
  • 5 See also

Effects

The Tentacle Staff grants +8 to-hit, and deals +5 damage and drain levels from non-resistant targets. When carried, the Tentacle Staff grants magic resistance; when wielded, it additionally confers fast energy regeneration and half spell damage. When invoked, it allows the player to level teleport, similar to the Orb of Fate.

Messages

The writhing tentacles draw the life from <target>!
You hit a monster with The Tentacle Staff and drained a level from it.

dNetHack

The variant dNetHack contains a somewhat similar artifact flail named The Tentacle Rod, which is the quest artifact for Drow Priests, Rangers, Rogues, and Wizards that turn renegade on their racial quest (retooled from the original Drow quest). It lacks the Staff's drain life attack and other properties, but it can deal multiple attacks and inflict status ailments on targets; while wielded, it also decreases the chance of spell failure and absorbs curses.

References

  1. ↑ artifact.c in SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2, line 1382
  2. ↑ SlashTHEM 0.9.7 artilist.h, line 543
  3. ↑ SlashTHEM 0.9.7 artilist.h, line 560
  • SLASH 6 include/artilist.h#line 370
  • SLASH 6 src/artifact.c#line 1059

See also

  • Drow quest
